dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 6845 IH: Commercial Remote Sensing Amendment Act of 2022
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Lucas (for himself and Mr. Perlmutter) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology

form.official-title: To provide for transparent licensing of commercial remote sensing systems.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Commercial Remote Sensing Amendment Act of 2022.

paragraph.text: Section 60121(c) of title 51, United States Code, is amended by striking 120 and inserting 60.
Section 60126(a)(1)(E) of title 51, United States Code, is amended by striking 120 and inserting 60.

subsection.text: Section 60126(a)(2) of title 51, United States Code, is amended by striking section 60122; and and inserting paragraphs (5) and (6) of section 60122(b);.
Section 60126(a) of title 51, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (2), by striking and at the end; and
by inserting after paragraph (2) the following:
all terms, conditions, or restrictions placed on licensees pursuant to section 60122; and

subsection.text: Section 60126(a)(1) of title 51, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (D), by striking and at the end;
in subparagraph (E), by inserting and at the end; and
by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: a list of all applications, listed by tier as defined in regulation, as well as the rationale for each tier categorization;

subsection.text: Section 60126 of title 51, United States Code, is amended by striking subsection (c).
